title: Sveltekit DEV server doesn't error when importing js code that uses client-side apis
body:
### Describe the bug

Just as the title suggests, the sveltekit development server SSRs components that import javascript code that uses the document object.  

(Rant: I'm not sure if this is a feature or anything, but having to debug errors that only present themselves during the deployment of production code is headache-inducing at best.)

### Reproduction

Here is a reproduction repo - https://github.com/Fractal-Tess/sveltekit-ssrbug

Steps:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Fractal-Tess/sveltekit-ssrbug 
cd sveltekit-ssrbug 
pnpm i
pnpm dev
```
Go ahead and look at `localhost:5173/` to see that the component has rendered fine (both on the server and the client)
Now build the app and run it.
```
pnpm build
node build
```
Go ahead and navigate back to `localhost:5173/` again, but this time there is SSR rendering exception. 

### Logs

```Shell
ReferenceError: document is not defined
    at +page.svelte:6:14
    at Object.$$render (/node_modules/.pnpm/svelte@3.55.1/node_modules/svelte/internal/index.mjs:1892:22)
    at Object.default (root.svelte:42:40)
    at eval (/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.9.2_svelte@3.55.1+vite@4.1.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/components/layout.svelte:8:41)
    at Object.$$render (/node_modules/.pnpm/svelte@3.55.1/node_modules/svelte/internal/index.mjs:1892:22)
    at root.svelte:41:39
    at $$render (/node_modules/.pnpm/svelte@3.55.1/node_modules/svelte/internal/index.mjs:1892:22)

    at Module.render_response (/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.9.2_svelte@3.55.1+vite@4.1.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/server/page/render.js:180:29)
    at async Module.render_page (/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.9.2_svelte@3.55.1+vite@4.1.4/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/server/page/index.js:310:10)
```
```
